citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
11-Sep-19. The inspector contacted the registrant by phone after arriving at the facility. The registrant indicated
she was away from the facility and unavailable for inspection.
A responsible person shall be available for inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
11-Sep-19.  The inspector contacted the registrant by phone after arriving at the facility.  The registrant indicated
she was away from the facility and unavailable for inspection. 
A responsible person shall be available for inspection during business hours.
